textContent: A normal difficulty boss that is unarmed, but if you bring them their weapon (from another part of the dungeon) it enables hard mode, to become one of the hardest bosses in the server.
title: Boss idea
textContentHtml: A normal difficulty boss that is unarmed, but if you bring them their weapon (from another part of the dungeon) it enables hard mode, to become one of the hardest bosses in the server.
